sentences.en: an amorphous mass of cells with no identity at all
sentences.cn: 不知何物的杂乱一团的细胞
他对她的身份守口如瓶。

sentences.en: He had to conceal his identity to escape the police.
sentences.cn: 为了躲避警方,他只好隐瞒身份.

sentences.en: He was shot in what seems to have been a case of mistaken identity .
sentences.cn: 他像是被人认错了而遭到枪击的。

sentences.en: He wears an identity disc around his neck.
sentences.cn: 他脖子上挂着圆形身份牌。

sentences.en: On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.
sentences.cn: 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产.

sentences.en: Police refused to divulge the identity of the suspect.
sentences.cn: 警方拒绝透露嫌疑犯的身份。

sentences.en: Spanish identity documents state the bearer's profession.
sentences.cn: 西班牙的身份证件会注明证件持有者的职业。

sentences.en: The identity cards are examined by an electronic scanner.
sentences.cn: 用电子扫描器来检验身份证。

sentences.en: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.
sentences.cn: 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身份.

sentences.en: The police think the videotape may hold some vital clues to the identity of the killer.
sentences.cn: 警方认为那盘录像带可能录有能确认凶手身份的一些重要线索。

sentences.en: There are conflicting reports about the identity of the hostage.
sentences.cn: 有关人质身份的报道相互矛盾。

sentences.en: They all seem to take an inflated view of their collective identity.
sentences.cn: 他们对自己的集体身份似乎都持有一种夸大的看法.

sentences.en: They are a lost generation in search of an identity.
sentences.cn: 他们属于迷惘的一代，想要找寻自我。

words.tran_cn: 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的
鉴定，识别；认同；身份证明
确定；识别；使参与；把…看成一样
身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式

phrases.tran_cn: 品牌识别；品牌标识；品牌同一性
族群认同，种族认同；民族认同
性别认同；性别认定；性（别）身份
身份证件；身分证明文件
身份管理；身份认证管理
个人统合，个人身份；人格同一性

trans.tran_en: someone’s identity is their name or who they are
